attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: The app is js terrible it it took the muffins outta the freezer i thought it was supposed to twist her mind and her anger level i just don’t recommend it it’s js terrible trust me use a better app.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: ANY VOTE OTHER THAN BIDEN WILL SUPPORT TRUMP. SETTLE FOR BIDEN!! so basically this app is HORRIBLE because it supports the humiliating leader that us americans unfortunately have. not only is the president, not my president tho (respect the manny flag), a racist and rapist, he is also terrible at designing an app! kinda hate him 🤷🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: HE TOOK MY DOG
attributes.review: I’m telling y’all this is the worst app ever. I decided to download it to see more about our hottie president 🍊 I open the app and the president himself came into my house and TOOK MY DOG and kicked my baby 👶 so rude.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is TERRIBLE. My phone was perfect before downloading and after I opened the app it completely glitches out and fried my phone so I had to get a new one.

attributes.title: Crash
attributes.review: Every time I open the app it crashes and just a bad app all together I wish it didn’t crash every time I opene it

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This is quite possibly the worst app on the App Store. Puts fake news on blast, what else does it even do. One star, would give zero if I could. Needs to be taken off the App Store.

attributes.title: Worse than eating boogers
attributes.review: This app will steal babies from mothers, deport your Doritos, run through a funeral yelling ‘I too have felt loss. Truly just the absolute worst.  Just hoping for a new update in November.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: Absolutely HORRIBLE, doesn’t have any information on it and is completely RACIST! This app is not worth getting and I do not recommend it at all. Please do not get this app.

attributes.title: Poo poo
attributes.review: This app is garbage. It literally smells terrible. It also took my pet dog and ate it’s poo poo 😡 that’s not very nice now is it. If I could give it 0 stars I would, but one will have to do. This app doesn’t deserve the one star.

attributes.title: What even
attributes.review: A TERRIBLE app, you’d think with all the money trump has in his grimy pockets he could make a functioning app but I guess not. Will be deleting ASAP and advise you to do the same 💅
